AI Description: QCAT is a software tool for managing and analyzing qualitative data. It is specifically designed to assist researchers in the coding, categorizing, and organizing of qualitative data such as text, images, audio, and video files.
Core Features: Code & Categorize Qualitative Data, Organize & Manage Qualitative Data, Analyze Qualitative Data For Patterns & Themes, Visualize & Present Qualitative Data Results
General Tags: Qualitative Data Analysis, Data Management, Research Tool
